desc.simpara: A GtkHSeparator is a widget that consists of a horizontal line. It is used to separate widgets that are laid out vertically.

note.simpara: Separators cannot be added to menu widgets. See GtkMenuItem for details.

desc.simpara: Constructing a GtkHSeparator and adding it to a widget amounts to the same thing as drawing a horizontal line across that widget. Use the container's packing methods to organise spacing around the separator.
